Fox4e.TipManage: Full lists of skills, resistances and other attributes that don't normally change during play
Fox4e.TipMinionHP: A missed attack never damages a minion
Fox4e.TipMoveConfig: Configure move speeds and special movement
Fox4e.TipNPCMath: Calculate Defences & Skills using baseline values like a Player Character
Fox4e.TipRechargeRoll: Roll 1d6 and recharge power on a roll of
Fox4e.TipSendChat: Use this item (send card to chat)
Fox4e.TipSheetImage: Click to choose or change the portrait
Fox4e.TipXPAward: XP awarded for defeating this creature
Fox4e.settings.style-journal.Name: Journal styles
Fox4e.settings.journal-font.Name: Journal body font
Fox4e.settings.style-chat.Name: Chat card styles
Fox4e.settings.style-tah.Name: TAH styles
Fox4e.settings.style-global.Name: Global styles
Fox4e.settings.style-chat-ex.Name: Extra chat styles
Fox4e.settings.style-journal.Hint: Style Journal areas (including in other sheets) to look like official 4e material
Fox4e.settings.journal-font.Hint: Change the base journal font; try sans-serif if you find the default unpleasant to read
Fox4e.settings.style-chat.Hint: Make item cards in chat look like official 4e material
Fox4e.settings.style-tah.Hint: [Token Action HUD] If using coloured buttons for powers, tweak the colours to match official 4e
Fox4e.settings.style-chat-ex.Hint: (Requires basic chat styles) These have nothing to do with book-accuracy, they're just cute.
Fox4e.settings.style-global.Hint: Tweaks various parts of the Foundry interface to work a little better with the 4e look. (May cause unexpected issues with other modules.)
